Text: What this really do? I download when you tell.
it makes a pirated copy valid, by suing a certain serial key, so it will make microsoft think you have a valid copy of windws xp!
Sooooo... This makes Windows 2000 to XP?
I haven't tried it, I still use a version I picked up a year ago (that still seems to work). But I have to wonder about some of the brain-dead comments I see like the above one.
